textmessage.set: $fmt='' worst1('x','x',11):$v format($v,3,1):$fmt if ($v<=(scales[1]*50)) then $VALUE='' else $VALUE='Worst case excursion '+$fmt+'%' endif
$fmt='' worst1('x','x',11):$v format($v,3,1):$fmt if ($v>(scales[1]*50)) then $VALUE='' else $VALUE='Worst case excursion '+$fmt+'%' endif

textmessage.set: $VALUE='Rise time in grad table: ---' $file=systemdir+'/imaging/gradtables/'+sysgcoil $r='' $v=0 $c=0 lookup('file',$file,'seek','trise','read'):$r,$c if $c=1 then format($r,5,6):$v else $v=0 endif $v=$v*1e06 $fmt='' format($v,3,1):$fmt $VALUE='Rise time in grad table: '+$fmt

label.label: Hit return after typing a value

textmessage.set: $VALUE='Gmax in grad table: ---' $file=systemdir+'/imaging/gradtables/'+sysgcoil $r='' $v=0 $c=0 lookup('file',$file,'seek','gmax','read'):$r,$c if $c=1 then format($r,5,6):$v else $v=0 endif $fmt='' format($v,3,1):$fmt $VALUE='Gmax in grad table: '+$fmt+' gauss/cm'

label.label: Hit return after typing a value

button.label: Load
button.vc: if (deccflag[7] < 0.5) then vnmrjcmd('popup','mode:modal','rebuild:yes','ok:decc_load(decctool_fln)','width:370','title:This will overwrite your modifications') else decc_load(decctool_fln) endif
